conbody.p: You can move through a document in the Editing Window.

li.p: To move to the next/previous position, press RightArrow/LeftArrow.
To move to the next/previous word, press Ctrl-RightArrow/Ctrl-LeftArrow.
To move to the next/previous line, press DownArrow/UpArrow.
To move to the start/end of the current line, press Ctrl-A/Ctrl-E.
To move to the next/previous element, press Ctrl-DownArrow/Ctrl-UpArrow, or choose Go Next Element/Previous Element .
To move to the start/end of the current element, press Ctrl-Home/Ctrl-End, or choose Go Element Start/Element End .
To move a page up/down, press PageUp/PageDown.
To move to the start/end of the document, press Ctrl-PageUp/Ctrl-PageDown.
To go to the next Choose element, press Ctrl-Alt-Enter, or choose Go Next Choice .

conbody.p: When you navigate a document in the Editing Window, the ContentMap is in sync with the cursor position in the Editing Window.
